name: ScratchMeow
tagline: ScratchMeow is a Scratch extension I am working on. This is my first ever Scratch extension that I ever made. So it might be slightly unstable or something. No builds published yet.
body:
# ScratchMeow
ScratchMeow is a useful Scratch extension wrote in JavaScript and is based on other extensions like ScratchExt and Scratch Boost.

# Installing
Install ScratchMeow by adding this bookmark:
[Run ScratchMeow](javascript:(function (){var s = document.createElement('script');s.setAttribute('src', 'https://cdn.rawgit.com/mcpro09/ScratchMeow-builds/master/SM_installer.js');document.body.appendChild(s);})();)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
